content: Ah, I forgot that info-level logging works with rustc_codegen_ssa
I would quite like a proper option though. Hiding linker output can sometimes mean I'm missing important warnings.

Chris Denton said:

The last time I needed it I had to set the environment variable RUSTC_LOG to rustc_codegen_ssa::back::link=info. Not sure if this has changed though.

seems to still work!
Lokathor has marked this topic as resolved.
